mapper.insert: insert into t_merchant_place_fee_month_record (month_date , place_id, eid, sn, rent_start_time ,rent_end_time,rent_days,place_fee,month_place_fee, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{item.monthDate}, #{item.placeId}, #{item.eid}, #{item.sn}, #{item.rentStartTime}, #{item.rentEndTime}, #{item.rentDays}, #{item.placeFee}, #{item.monthPlaceFee}, #{item.tenantId}), #{item.delFlag}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime})
mapper.select: select tenant_id, sum(month_place_fee) as month_total_place_fee, sum(rent_days) as month_rent_days, any_value(place_id) AS place_id, any_value(month_date) AS month_date, any_value(sn) AS sn, any_value(rent_start_time) AS rent_start_time, any_value(rent_end_time) AS rent_end_time, any_value(rent_days) AS rent_days, any_value(place_fee) AS place_fee, any_value(month_place_fee) AS month_place_fee from t_merchant_place_fee_month_record where month_date = #{date} and tenant_id = #{tenantId} and del_flag = 0 group by tenant_id, place_id
